p: Ten cats diagnosed with alimentary lymphoma were treated with low‐dose radiation. Seven cats diagnosed with small cell lymphoma were treated with 3 Gy total and three diagnosed with intermediate cell lymphoma were treated with 4 Gy total. Acute effects associated with radiation therapy were not observed. Median overall survival time for cats treated with radiation therapy was 1368 days, the median overall survival time for the control population receiving chemotherapy alone was 1161 days.
